title: Ford EV Sales Triple in Sept., Continues As America’s No. 2 EV Brand; Mustang Mach-E Climbs 47%; F-Series, Transit Vans Rank First in Both Gas And Electric; Bronco Sales More Than Triple
description: Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F) today reported its September 2022 U.S. sales results. Click here or visit media.ford.com to view the news release.
